TopicTitle: filter for parts of different sizes

Articles.Content:
Hallo,

I think it would be nice to have a possibility to sort/hide the parts in the vehicle assembly by size. If you for example select only the 2.5 m parts, only these will be shown in the assembly as well as all adapter parts with a 2.5 m node. I don't know how to categorise the wing types, maybe the sorting can be used for canards/small wings/big wings?

What do you think of this idea?
0.90 will apparently overhaul the part category system and if I remember correctly, will enable you to create custom part categories so you can do that yourself.
